name: Weekly Crypto Bollinger-RSI Mean Reversion
description: Mean-reverting weekly strategy for major USD-quoted cryptocurrencies. Enters long when close is below the 20-week lower Bollinger Band and RSI(14) <30; enters short on upper band + RSI>70. Exits at mid-band or RSI 50 cross, with hard 3 % stop-loss and 5 % take-profit. Position risk capped at 2 % of equity.
